BRAIxMOP 0.2.7.2
  • Reference

    Reference

    Package description

    BRAIxMOP

    Model Operating Point analysis

    Pipeline function

    prepare_data_for_simulation()

    Prepare / process data for simulation

    get_reader_performance_for_matching()

    Get reader performance for matching

    get_ai_threshold_and_performance()

    Find the operating point / threshold at which the AI will match the reader specificity and compute the performance at that threshold

    get_ai_threshold_and_performance_bandpass()

    Find the operating point / threshold at which the AI will match target specificity and sensitivity and compute the performance at that threshold (Band-pass scenario)

    Data preprocessing and validation

    load_reader_file()

    Load the reader file

    load_model_file()

    Load the model file

    match_episodes()

    Find matching episodes between the model and the reader files

    fix_abnormal_ambiguous_outcome()

    Tidy up the abnormal / ambiguous outcome

    convert_model_df_into_unit_of_episodes()

    Convert model predictions into unit of episodes

    convert_reader_df_into_unit_of_episodes()

    Convert reader reads into unit of episodes

    save_clean_data_to_disk()

    Save clean data to disk

    check_dates()

    Check the development set dates are correct

    check_reader_df_has_correct_unit()

    Check reader file has the correct unit, i.e. one episode per row

    Scenario analysis

    Integrating AI into screening pathways

    baseline()

    Baseline scenario

    AI_baseline_check()

    Baseline scenario with simulated third reader

    AI_band_pass_independent()

    Band-pass screening with independent simulated third reader

    AI_band_pass_screening()

    Band-pass screening followed by standard pathway

    AI_band_pass_screening_ms()

    Band-pass screening with manufacturer specific thresholds

    AI_autonomous_screening_ideal()

    AI autonomous screening (ideal)

    AI_autonomous_screening_practical()

    AI autonomous screening (practical)

    AI_independent()

    AI independent reading

    AI_independent_replace_1()

    AI independent reading

    AI_independent_replace_3()

    AI independent reading

    AI_independent_replace_random()

    AI independent reading

    AI_independent_replace_random_second_reader_arbiter()

    AI replacement with second reader as third reader when the episodes are not available

    AI_independent_replace_random_mixed_sim()

    AI replacement with mixed-simulated third reader

    AI_replacement_2_and_3()

    AI replacement of reader 2 and 3

    AI_final_pass()

    AI final-pass reading

    AI_masai()

    MASAI simulation

    autonomous_independent()

    AI autonomous screening (ideal) + AI independent

    autonomous_final_pass()

    AI autonomous screening (ideal) + final pass

    independent_final_pass()

    AI independent reader 2 + final pass

    autonomous_independent_final_pass()

    AI autonomous screening (ideal) + AI independent + final pass

    autonomous_single_independent_final_pass()

    AI autonomous screening (ideal) + single AI independent + final pass

    AI_band_pass_audit()

    Human-AI interaction with the band-pass simulation

    AI_band_pass_audit_all_readers()

    Human-AI interaction with the band-pass simulation

    AI_band_pass_drift()

    AI band-pass scenario with drift

    AI_band_pass_drift_quantile_threshold()

    AI band-pass scenario with drift

    AI_band_pass_learn()

    Human-AI interaction with the band-pass simulation

    AI_band_pass_learn_all_readers()

    Human-AI interaction with the band-pass simulation

    AI_band_pass_risk()

    AI band-pass scenario with dummy AI readers

    AI_band_pass_template()

    Human-AI interaction with the band-pass simulation template

    AI_independent_audit()

    AI independent simulation (audit)

    AI_independent_drift()

    AI independent scenario with drift

    AI_independent_drift_quantile_threshold()

    AI independent scenario with drift

    AI_independent_interaction()

    AI independent reading

    AI_independent_learn()

    AI independent simulation (learn)

    AI_independent_risk()

    AI independent scenario with dummy AI readers

    AI_independent_template()

    AI independent simulation template

    AI_masai_audit_AI()

    Human-AI interaction with the MASAI (triage) simulation

    AI_masai_audit_AI_all_paths()

    Human-AI interaction with the MASAI (triage) simulation

    AI_masai_audit_AI_all_readers()

    Human-AI interaction with the MASAI (triage) simulation

    AI_masai_drift()

    AI triage scenario with drift

    AI_masai_learn_from_AI()

    Human-AI interaction with the MASAI (triage) simulation

    AI_masai_learn_from_AI_all_paths()

    Human-AI interaction with the MASAI (triage) simulation

    AI_masai_learn_from_AI_all_readers()

    Human-AI interaction with the MASAI (triage) simulation

    AI_masai_risk()

    AI triage scenario with dummy AI readers

    AI_masai_template()

    Human-AI interaction with the MASAI (triage) simulation template

    AI_sequential()

    Sequential reader scenario

    AI_single()

    Single ADMANI reader

    AI_single_audit()

    Single reader auditing output from AI

    AI_single_learn()

    Single reader learning from AI

    scenario_summary()

    Summary of a scenario

    Pipelines

    Running the scenarios and generating statistics

    run_simulation()

    Run simulation analysis

    run_simulation_bootstrap()

    Run simulation analysis with bootstrap

    run_baseline()

    The baseline scenario

    run_AI_bandpass()

    The AI bandpass scenario. The AI reader is added at the beginning of the standard screening pathway.

    run_AI_replacement()

    The AI replacement scenario. The AI reader replaces one of the first two human readers randomly, and the third reader is simulated.

    run_simulation_arbiter_variations()

    Run simulation analysis

    Reader agents

    Readers for simulation

    admani_reader()

    Readers from the actual database

    AI_adaptive_reader()

    (Deprecated) The AI model using different thresholds for the manufacturers

    AI_reader()

    The AI model

    simulated_reader()

    A reader simulated based on empirical performance

    simulated_reader_with_ai_interaction()

    A simulated reader with access to AI decision

    random_reader()

    A reader that does purely guessing based on a coin flip

    oracle_reader()

    A simulated reader that uses the ground truth as prediction

    mixed_reader()

    A reader that uses the actual database when possible and simulates when not

    reader_n3()

    A third reader that uses the early readers' read if the episodes are not available at the third position.

    reader_auditing_ai()

    A reader with access to AI decision (auditor)

    reader_learning_from_ai()

    A reader with access to AI decision (learner)

    correction_reader()

    A oracle "reader" that corrects some proportion of the predictions

    merge_two_readers()

    Merge the results from two readers

    sequential_merge_two_readers()

    Sequential merge of two readers

    sequential_soft_merge_two_readers()

    Sequential soft-merge of two readers

    corrective_merge_two_readers()

    Correct the first reader by the second reader (checking with respect to the ground truth)

    err_merge_two_readers()

    Err the first reader by the second reader (checking with respect to the ground truth)

    Operating points / thresholds

    find_threshold_matching()

    Find the threshold that matches a specific value of metrics

    find_manufacturer_threshold_matching()

    Find the manufacturer specific thresholds that match a specific value of metrics

    apply_manufacturer_threshold()

    Apply manufacturer specific threshold

    apply_manufacturer_quantile_threshold()

    Apply manufacturer specific threshold by specifying quantile

    get_manufacturer_quantile_threshold()

    Get manufacturer specific threshold by specifying quantile

    Statistics

    roc()

    Compute the ROC curve of the model data frame

    confusion_matrix()

    Confusion matrix

    get_consensus_performance()

    Get the consensus performance of the readers

    Summary of readersâ€™ performance

    get_reader_summary()

    Get reader summary statistics

    mean_reader()

    Compute the average TPR and FPR of the readers

    mean_reader_by_position()

    Compute the average TPR and FPR of the readers by position

    get_reader_performance()

    Get the individual performance of the readers

    Utility functions

    num_episodes()

    Count the number of episodes in a data frame

    is_unit_episode()

    Whether the unit of a data frame is episode

    as_episode_df()

    Convert image-unit predictions into episode-unit predictions

    save_RDS()

    Serialise an R object

    RDS_to_JSON()

    Convert an RDS file to a JSON file

    blue()

    Colored terminal output

    yellow()

    Colored terminal output
